title: 7.30 Report: The Dismissal
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Politics and government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Politics - Australia
abstract: A special edition of the ABC's nightly current affairs program '7:30 Report', broadcast on 10th November, 2005.
description: On the eve of the thirtieth anniversary of the dismissal of the Whitlam government, a special edition of the ABC's national nightly current affairs program, '7:30 Report' takes an in-depth look at the events of 1975.  The program features interviews with both Gough Whitlam and Malcolm Fraser who comment on the events of 1975, discuss the possibility of 4 year fixed terms for both the House of Representatives and the Senate and reflect upon the politics of modern Australia, and upon each other.  Broadcast on 10th November, 2005.
